name: Andoni Alonso Fernández
title: Senior Cloud Security Engineer
bio: I began my career as a Sysadmin, evolved to Site Reliability Engineer, and a few years ago crossed over to the dark side… Security. A long-time CTF enthusiast and hooked on anything with a scoreboard. Currently, I'm starting unicrons.cloud project aiming to share cloud security knowledge and resources with the community.
session_titles: IAM policy mishaps: A cautionary tale of cloud misconfigurations
